template.description: Fills this current memory location with a value
template.name: .word

template.description: Add two registers and store in a register
template.name: add

template.description: Add an immediate value to a register and store in a register
template.name: addi

template.description: Compare two registers and branch to label if they are equal
template.name: beq

template.description: Store PC+1 in a register and jump to the address in the source register
template.name: jalr

template.description: Loads the address of the label into the register
template.name: la

template.description: Load a memory value into a register given a register and an offset
template.name: lw

template.description: Nand two registers and store in a register
template.name: nand

template.description: Store a register value into memory given a register and an offset
template.name: sw
